job description:
Duration: 12 months

Description:

This position requires someone with BS/BA degree in Medical Technology, Biochemistry, Chemistry, Biology, or related field with 1-3 years of experience working at biochemistry/clinical chemistry laboratories. The successful candidate will assume bench responsibility for assay development and/or method enhancement tasks including optimization of reagent formulation, verification of product performance, and the development of solutions to resolve technical problems. The incumbent requires good oral and written communication skills and being able to use software products to analyze data and prepare reports. Experience and knowledge in assay development is highly desirable. Extensive knowledge of Microsoft Excel is required.
